    • showSuccessAlert

      public void showSuccessAlert()
      Displays a success alert. Shows an information alert indicating that the customer data has been saved successfully.

    • showErrorAlert

      public void showErrorAlert(String errorMessage)
      Displays an error alert. Shows an error alert indicating that an error occurred while saving the customer data.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - The error message to be displayed in the alert.

    • customerSaveAction

      public int customerSaveAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      Handles the action to save customer information.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggering the action.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the insertion operation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller with data from the database. Populates the countryComboBox and manages divisionComboBox based on selected country.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the location used to resolve the object.
      resourceBundle - The ResourceBundle to be used for localization.
